API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.Appearance

type
class
version
3.1
Represents the appearance property of the visible objects.

The appearance holds the front and back materials of the object.

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_oFront The front material
p_oBack The back material
see
sandy.materials.ColorMaterial
sandy.materials.Material
Creates an appearance with front and back materials.

If no material is passed, the default material for back and front is a default ColorMaterial.
If only a front material is passed, it will be used as back material as well.

Instance Variables

__getModified(default,method) : Void -> Bool

backMaterial(__getBackMaterial,__setBackMaterial) : Material

The back material held by this appearance.

dispose(default,method) : Void -> Void

Dispose the front and back materials. Be careful, this may affect the other shapes that are using the same appearance or materials. References to front and back materials are set to null.

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

Returns the flags for the front and back materials.

frontMaterial(__getFrontMaterial,__setFrontMaterial) : Material

The front material held by this appearance.

lightingEnable(__getLightingEnable,__setLightingEnable) : Bool

Return if the light has been enable on one of the 2 material (OR exclusion).

modified(__getModified,null) : Bool

Returns a boolean if the appearance has been modified and needs a redraw.

toString(default,method) : Void -> String

Returns a string representation of this object.

useVertexNormal(__getUseVertexNormal,null) : Bool

Get the use of vertex normal feature of the appearance.

Note: Only one of the materials is using this feature.
